idea-plugin.name: Screen
idea-plugin.description:
IDE support for the Screen compiler plugin.
  • Resolves generated TAG and KEY companion object constants for @Screen-annotated classes
  • Gutter icon on @Screen classes showing generated constants
  • Quick documentation (Ctrl+Q) for generated TAG and KEY properties
  • Inspection warning when manually defining constants that conflict with generated ones
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.0
  • Bundled FIR compiler plugin provider for K2 analysis
  • Gutter icon line marker for @Screen classes
  • Documentation provider for generated TAG and KEY properties
  • Inspection for conflicting manual constant definitions
